name: Hell's Pinball (element_dev)
description:
An infernal Pinball. Try your luck in devious challenges that will reward you with many points, but don’t run out of time or you will pay for your mistake with your life.

Features :
  • A finely crafted pixel art pinball table
  • Many challenges for you to complete
  • One final boss fight
  • Finely tuned physics
  • One heavy metal inspired midi soundtrack
  • Many earth shattering sound effects
  • Screenshake
Controls :
  • Left flippers / Choose in menu : Left arrow, A, Z, Q, S, W, X, Left Shift (doesn't work in web)
  • Right flippers / Choose in menu : Right arrow, P, O, L, Right Shift (doesn't work in web)
  • Plunger/ Confirm menu : Space, Down arrow
  • M : Mute Music
  • F11 : Fullscreen (doesn't work in web)
Instructions :
  • Go inside the demon shop 3 times to choose a challenge. If you take the bet, you will have to complete before the timer expires. Finish the challenge to complete the pentagram at the center of the screen. But beware, if you run out of time, you will loose your ball.
  • Once the pentagram is complete, you can go inside the portal to fight the boss. Kill him to score many points !
  • You can activate the side ball savers by completing the HELL word at the bottom of the table.
  • You can activate the central ball saver by hitting the four purple aliens
Credits :
  • Goomboo (@MapleGecko) : Graphics, Level Design
  • Valden (@ValdenThoranar) : Code, Audio, Design
Tools used :
  • Game Maker Studio 2 (Code and physics engine)
  • Aseprite (Sprite Work)
  • FL Studio 20 (Music and sound fx)
